Package org.fcrepo.http.api

Class FedoraFixity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.http.commons.AbstractResource
      • org.fcrepo.http.api.FedoraBaseResource
        • org.fcrepo.http.api.ContentExposingResource
          • org.fcrepo.http.api.FedoraFixity
  • @Scope("request")
@Path("/{path: .*}/fcr:fixity")
public class FedoraFixity
extends ContentExposingResource
    Run a fixity check on a path

    Jun 12, 2013
    Author:
    ajs6f
